definitions.definition: If you freeze something, you lower its temperature below 0°C, causing it to become cold and often hard, and if something freezes, its temperature goes below 0°C:
examples: Water freezes to ice at a temperature of 0°C.

definitions.definition: to make food last a long time by storing it at a very low temperature so that it becomes hard:
examples: I'll freeze any food that's left over.

definitions.definition: a period of extremely cold weather
